abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman is investigating death of Raynette Turner, woman found dead in holding cell in Mount Vernon after she was arrested on shoplifting charges; cause of Turner's death has not yet been determined.
lead_paragraph: The cause of death of Raynette Turner, who was arrested on shoplifting charges and was being held at Mount Vernon Police Headquarters, has not been determined.

headline.main: Woman’s Death in Mount Vernon, N.Y., Holding Cell Will Be Investigated by State Attorney General
headline.print_headline: Attorney General to Investigate Death of Woman in Mt. Vernon Holding Cell

snippet: The cause of death of Raynette Turner, who was arrested on shoplifting charges and was being held at Mount Vernon Police Headquarters, has not been determined.
